input_text: Translation back to English failed.Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

translations.to_spanish: A pesar de que estaba lloviendo mucho, los corredores de maratón continuaron su carrera con determinación y entusiasmo.
translations.to_english: Even though it was raining heavily, marathon runners continued their career with determination and enthusiasm.

input_text: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been away on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

translations.to_spanish: Ella pospuso la reunión hasta que su gerente, que había estado fuera en un viaje de negocios, regresó a la oficina con la aprobación final.
translations.to_english: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been away on a business trip, returned to the office with final approval.

input_text: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself yearning for the solitude of the mountains.

translations.to_spanish: Mientras disfruto pasar tiempo con amigos en la playa, a menudo me encuentro anhelando la soledad de las montañas.
translations.to_english: While I enjoy spending time with friends on the beach, I often find myself yearning for the solitude of the mountains.

input_text: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those without a background in physics, could understand the significance of the findings.

translations.to_spanish: El científico explicó el experimento en detalle para que todos, incluidos los que no tienen experiencia en física, pudieran entender la importancia de los hallazgos.
translations.to_english: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those who have no experience in physics, could understand the importance of the findings.

input_text: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will achieve more than you ever thought possible in life.

translations.to_spanish: Si trabajas duro y te mantienes enfocado en tus metas, conseguirás más de lo que jamás pensaste posible en la vida.
translations.to_english: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will get more than you ever thought possible in life.

input_text: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by locals, the service was slow, and the food did not live up to our expectations.

translations.to_spanish: Aunque el restaurante fue altamente recomendado por los lugareños, el servicio fue lento, y la comida no estuvo a la altura de nuestras expectativas.
translations.to_english: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by the locals, the service was slow, and the food did not live up to our expectations.

input_text: Because she studied diligently every night for the past month, Maria performed exceptionally well on her final exams.

translations.to_spanish: Debido a que estudió diligentemente todas las noches durante el mes pasado, María actuó excepcionalmente bien en sus exámenes finales.
translations.to_english: Because she diligently studied every night during the past month, Mary performed exceptionally well in her final exams.

input_text: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which, in turn, led to increased productivity across all departments.

translations.to_spanish: La empresa aplicó nuevas políticas para mejorar la satisfacción de los empleados, lo que, a su vez, llevó a una mayor productividad en todos los departamentos.
translations.to_english: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which in turn led to increased productivity in all departments.

input_text: After the storm had passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

translations.to_spanish: Después de que la tormenta había pasado y el sol reapareció, los niños se aventuraron afuera a jugar en los charcos dejados atrás.
translations.to_english: After the storm had passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

input_text: Whenever he travels abroad, John makes it a point to learn a few basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.

translations.to_spanish: Cada vez que viaja al extranjero, John hace un punto para aprender algunas frases básicas en el idioma local para mostrar respeto por la cultura.
translations.to_english: Every time he travels abroad, John makes a point to learn some basic phrases in the local language to show respect for culture.
